## Load Packages
```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

## Importing and Fixing all Religious Data from 117th Congress!
```{r}
#importing the df 
religion <- import("/Users/naomiliftman/Desktop/GOV338/Final Project/117congress.xlsx") 

#rename the last five names
relig <- religion %>% 
  rename_with(~ tolower(gsub(".", "", .x, fixed = TRUE))) %>% 
  rename("type" = 2) %>% 
  rename("name" = 3) %>% 
  rename("party" = 4 ) %>% 
  rename("cont" = 5) %>% 
  rename("religion" = 6)

#rename the state
names(relig)[1] = "state"  

#remove the first row
relig <- relig[-c(1:1), ]
```
